Please advise us the nature of this credit note in the name of Mr. Patrick amounting to AED 63,000/-.

If this is a reimbursement to his claim, kindly remove this amount and issue a cheque in the name of Mr. Patrick Chalhoub.

Awaiting confirmation.

Thank you.

Dear Valued Customer, 

 

Please find enclosed your statement of account as of 18/12/2024 , for your review.

 

Kindly review the same and settle the outstanding premium, if due, at the earliest.

 

If the payment has been processed already, please share with us the cheque/payment advise to enable our team to update your account. 

 

A negative account balance may indicate a refund or another issue that requires clarification. Please contact our team promptly to address this issue.

If the payment has been processed already, please share with us the cheque/payment advise to enable our team to update your account. 

 

A negative account balance may indicate a refund or another issue that requires clarification. Please contact our team promptly to address this issue.

 

If we do not receive any query from you within 7 days, kindly note that the attached statment of account will be considered accepted.

  

For further clarification regarding the enclosed document, please contact us and we will be happy to assist you.

 

 

Best Regards

 

Accounts Department

 

Nasco Gulf
P.O. Box 26590, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 8610  F +971 4 351 8710

Dear Valued Customer, 

 

Please find enclosed your statement of account as of 18/12/2024 , for your review.

 

Kindly review the same and settle the outstanding premium, if due, at the earliest.

 

If the payment has been processed already, please share with us the cheque/payment advise to enable our team to update your account. 

 

A negative account balance may indicate a refund or another issue that requires clarification. Please contact our team promptly to address this issue.

 

If we do not receive any query from you within 7 days, kindly note that the attached statment of account will be considered accepted.

  

For further clarification regarding the enclosed document, please contact us and we will be happy to assist you.

 

 

Best Regards

 

Accounts Department
